response:
"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unsere persönlichen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es überhaupt noch unternehmen, die darauf achten, unsere privatsphäre zu schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there any companies left that actually care about protecting our privacy? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of data privacy and questions the motives of companies that collect and sell personal information. it also expresses frustration at the lack of attention given to privacy protection by some companies. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post with ongoing conversations about data privacy on twitter.
